changes: New: Saved Meals — tap the heart icon on any generated meal to save it to your favorites
New: Saved Meals page — view all your favorites in a clean list, tap to expand full details
New: Add to Macros, Share, Translate, and Prepare with Chef all work from saved meals
New: Trainers now have follow-up scheduling — schedule 4, 8, or 12 week check-ins from client dashboards
Improved: Trainer Studio and Physicians Clinic now have fully matching capabilities
